# shinycdrs

<!-- badges: start -->
[![Lifecycle: experimental](https://img.shields.io/badge/lifecycle-experimental-orange.svg)](https://lifecycle.r-lib.org/articles/stages.html#experimental)
<!-- badges: end -->

This package contains the Shiny app for the California Delta Residents Survey. It is currently in development.

## Installation

You can install the development version of shinycdrs from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("ktomari/shinycdrs")
```
